Package dao

Class AppointmentDaoImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • dbConnection.JDBCConnection
      • dao.AppointmentDaoImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ServiceIfc<Appointment>
    public class AppointmentDaoImpl
extends JDBCConnection
implements ServiceIfc<Appointment>
    This class contains logics for the data flow between the controller and the appointments table in the database.

      • isDoubleBooking

        public boolean isDoubleBooking​(long customerID,
                               java.time.LocalDateTime startApt,
                               java.time.LocalDateTime endApt)
        This method checks whether a new appointment time is already been booked.
        Parameters:
        customerID - the customer id user has selected
        startApt - appointment start time
        endApt - appointment end time
        Returns:
        returns true when the time is available, otherwise, returns false.

      • isAppointmentTimeUpdated

        private boolean isAppointmentTimeUpdated​(java.time.LocalDateTime aptStartTime,
                                         java.time.LocalDateTime aptEndTime)
        This method checks whether the appointment schedule is changes or if it is a new appointment
        Parameters:
        aptStartTime - an appointment starting time
        aptEndTime - an appointment ending time
        Returns:
        false when the appointment time is not changed, otherwise returns true.

      • filterByDate

        public java.util.List<Appointment> filterByDate​(java.util.List<Appointment> scheduleList,
                                                java.time.LocalDateTime aptStartTime)
        This methods filters appointment by dates. returns the same date in EST timezone
        Parameters:
        scheduleList - a list of time that is already scheduled and saved in database
        aptStartTime - a new appointment starting time
        Returns:
        returns a list of appointment that is in the same date.
